• Non-urgent elective delivery must only be done with a valid indication and beyond 39 weeks gestation (or with
proven lung maturity if gestation is unsure and the indication valid).
• The need for labour induction post-term may be reduced by routine sweeping of the membranes during antenatal
visits from 39 weeks onwards.
o Using sterile precautions, a finger is introduced through the cervix and swept in an arc between the
